entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story. He is recognized by his ability to identify Errol and Hedwig.

entities.name: errol
entities.description: An owl that belongs to the Weasley family. Harry recognizes him immediately.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Harry's own owl. She is carrying a parcel and looks pleased with herself.

entities.name: weasley family
entities.description: The family that Errol belongs to.

relationships.description: Harry recognizes Errol as belonging to the Weasley family.
Harry owns Hedwig, his own owl.
Errol belongs to the Weasley family.
